explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a transparent jelly with a yellow round object wrapped inside. The jelly is placed on a yellow plate, behind which stands a signboard. There is a green plant behind the signboard.

[0-2] The hand lifts the fried egg jelly, and the yellowish-white text "egg" appears to the left of the jelly. The scene then shifts to a black-haired woman with a necklace and a white vest. She holds the fried egg jelly in her left hand and tastes it with her head tilted up. There are green plants beside her. The yellowish-white text "Eat raw eggs" is displayed below her mouth.

[0-2] The hand lifts the fried egg jelly, and the yellowish-white text "egg" appears to the left of the jelly. The scene then shifts to a black-haired woman with a necklace and a white vest. [2-4] The scene transitions to a wooden cutting board where a cat paw presses down on a mango, and a knife cuts the mango.
[2-4] The scene transitions to a wooden cutting board where a cat paw presses down on a mango, and a knife cuts the mango.

[4-9] The camera then cuts to the cat paw still pressing on the cut mango while a spoon scoops out a piece of mango flesh. The scene switches to a blender where the cat paw puts the mango flesh. The cat paw then pours liquid from a beaker into the blender, and the yellowish-white text "water" appears above the blender. The cat paw then uses the spoon to add a spoonful of powder into the blender, and the yellowish-white text "sodium alginate" shows above the blender. Finally, the cat paw closes the blender lid, and the blender starts running.
